location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 21: William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Officials at Bussora [Basra], to John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter, received 2 April 1779, from William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, reports the death of Carim Caun [Karim Khan] and the recent change of rulership at Schiraz [Shiraz], as carried out by Sadoo Caun [Sadiq Khan, brother of Karim Khan].
